name: ACN.INC
description: Direct Seller of Telecom and Energy
overview:
ACN is the world’s largest direct seller of telecommunications, energy and other essential services people use every day, offering a home-based business opportunity for its Independent Business Owners in 23 countries and 4 continents.

ACN is a proud member of the Direct Selling Association in many countries and serves on its U.S. Board. Every member company pledges to abide by the DSA’s Code of Ethics as a condition of membership. ACN was just honored with Best Twitter Campaign at the Direct Selling Association Marketing Conference in December 2012.
